locations.name: Operation Room
locations.description: A square-shaped operation room with only one set of doors, an operating table, and a mirror

locations.name: Hallway Middle
locations.description: a long horizontal hallway stretching into darkness as lights flicker above your head.

locations.name: Hallway East 1
locations.description: a long hallway with two doors on the left leading to the Men's and Ladies' bathrooms, and one door on the right with a sign that reads "Janitor's Closet"
